channel.title: [508] Changing "You don't have enough coins" Re-Explained [508]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I made a shop with items only able to be bought with tokens (item:8551) and I want it to show "You don't have enough tokens" instead of coins when using this shop, I tried everything I know in shopbuyconfig,java nothing worked.
Thanks, Justinxg27

item.title: [508] Changing "You don't have enough coins" Re-Explained [508]
